```{r load packages and set options, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse) 
library(stargazer)
library(sandwich)
library(lmtest)
library(Hmisc)
library(funModeling)
library(olsrr)

theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r load data, message = FALSE, include=FALSE}
mpg <- read.csv("../datasets/vehicles.csv",  header = TRUE)
```
```{r}
only_trucks <-dplyr::filter(mpg, VClass == "Standard Pickup Trucks"  | VClass =="Standard Pickup Trucks 2WD" | VClass == "Standard Pickup Trucks 4WD")
#mpg_has_luggage_and_passenger <-dplyr::filter(only_trucks, pv2 != 0 | pv4 != 0)
#mpg_with_classifier <- mpg_has_luggage_and_passenger %>% mutate( isTwoDoor = (pv2 != 0))
#two_door <- dplyr::filter(mpg_with_classifier, isTwoDoor == TRUE) %>% mutate( total_volume = pv2 + lv2)
#four_door <- dplyr::filter(mpg_with_classifier, isTwoDoor == FALSE) %>% mutate( total_volume = pv4 + lv4)
final_mpg_dataset <- only_trucks
rm(list=c("two_door", "four_door", "mpg_has_luggage", "mpg_has_luggage_and_passenger", "mpg_with_classifier"))
```

```{r check correlations}
correlation_table(data=final_mpg_dataset, target="city08")
```

```{r plots }
ggplot(final_mpg_dataset, aes(x=cylinders, y=city08)) + 
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method=lm)

ggplot(final_mpg_dataset, aes(x=displ, y=city08)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method=lm)

ggplot(final_mpg_dataset, aes(x=engId, y=city08)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method=lm)

ggplot(final_mpg_dataset, aes(x=trany, y=city08)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method=lm)

ggplot(final_mpg_dataset, aes(x=VClass, y=city08)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method=lm)

ggplot(final_mpg_dataset, aes(x=startStop , y=city08)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method=lm)
```
```{r fits }
mpg_fit_01 <- final_mpg_dataset %>% lm(city08 ~ displ, data = .)
mpg_fit_01_se <- mpg_fit_01 %>% vcovHC(type = "HC1") %>% diag() %>% sqrt()
stargazer(mpg_fit_01, type="text",se = list(mpg_fit_01_se))
coeftest(mpg_fit_01, vconv = vcovHC(type = "HC1"))
#mpg_fit_o1_vif = ols_vif_tol(mpg_fit_01)
plot(mpg_fit_01)
lmtest::bptest(mpg_fit_01)
```
